typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movies1
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		movie = movies1@movie,
		title = movies1@title,
		genres = movies1@genres,
		year = movies1@year,
		Rating = movies1@Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		dateOfETL
	)) ~> Select1
movies1, source1 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
